listings.title: Charming Craftsman Home
listings.description: Beautiful craftsman home with original woodwork, updated kitchen, and a lovely backyard garden. Walking distance to shops and restaurants. Features hardwood floors throughout, a cozy fireplace, and a spacious front porch perfect for relaxing.

listings.title: Modern Downtown Condo
listings.description: Stunning modern condo in the heart of downtown with floor-to-ceiling windows and breathtaking city views. Open concept living, high-end finishes, and building amenities including gym and rooftop deck.

listings.title: Spacious Family Home
listings.description: Gorgeous family home in a quiet neighborhood with excellent schools nearby. Features a gourmet kitchen, master suite with spa bath, bonus room, and a beautifully landscaped backyard with patio.

listings.title: Waterfront Townhouse
listings.description: Stunning waterfront townhouse with panoramic views of the Puget Sound. Modern open floor plan, chef's kitchen, and private deck overlooking the water. Low-maintenance living at its finest.

listings.title: Cozy Starter Home
listings.description: Perfect starter home or investment property. Recently updated with new roof, windows, and HVAC. Cozy living room, eat-in kitchen, and fenced backyard. Great location near parks and transit.

listings.title: Luxury Estate
listings.description: Exceptional luxury estate with stunning lake and mountain views. Features include a gourmet kitchen, home theater, wine cellar, infinity pool, and meticulously landscaped grounds.
